クラス SpectrumFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • filehandling.spc.SpectrumFile

extends java.lang.Object
    新生spc File

      • getInstance

        public static final SpectrumFile getInstance(SpcFileName spcFileName)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        If the named file does not exist, is a directory rather than a regular file, or for some other reason cannot be opened for reading then a IOException is thrown.
        パラメータ:
        spcFileName - must exist.
        戻り値:
        SpectrumFile of the spcFileName
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - If the spcFileName does not exist, or an I/O error occurs

      • output

        public abstract void output(java.nio.file.Path outPath,
                            java.nio.file.OpenOption... options)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        ファイルにバイナリで書き出す
        パラメータ:
        outPath - 出力ファイル
        options - for output
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
